channel.title: Fixing nulls and other questions
channel.description:
Okay first, in my server when I run it there appears to be a null when i check for players. And i want to get rid of them completely cause it slows down the server and makes everything take longer then it should. At one point I had 30 players and they were mostly nulls. So my question is how to a fix the null problem if possible.
And my second question is how to you add lvl requirements to wear stuff, like dragon would be you need 60 def, att, str to use and so on. I know there maybe a tut in the tut sectin but i want to see if there is an easier way to fix the problem.

item.title: Fixing nulls and other questions
item.dc:creator: @black_death black death
item.description:
@black_death wrote:

yea i google it and i found something. can’t wait to try it out soon

Read full topic
